'''Lightning-Riding Treasure Hunter (I)''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Inazuma: The Islands of Thunder and Eternity - Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to open 300 [[chests]] on [[Narukami Island]], [[Kannazuka]], and [[Yashiori Island]] in Inazuma.
